name: 陳錦文
objective:
1. 本課程主要說明各種紡織材料之組成和成形，基本性質，各種加工與應用。 
2. 本課程主要簡介紡織科技所包含之原料與製程，製品和評估，同時訓練學生了解基本的紡織辭彙。
1. Introduction to textile compositions, properties, spinning, processings and applications. 
2. Textile materials and related processes are introduced, and technical used are learned as well.
schedule:
Week 1: Introduction to Textile Materials (紡織材料概論)
Week 2-3: Fiber Spinning and Characteristic (纖維紡絲與特性)
Week 3-4: Fiber Processing Technology (纖維加工技術)
Week 5-6: Natural Fiber (天然纖維)
Week 7-8: Regenerated Fiber (再生纖維)
Week 9: Midterm exam
Week 10-11 Semi-synthetic Fiber (半合成纖維)
Week 12-13 Synthetic Fiber (合成纖維)　
Week 14-15 High-performance Fiber (高性能纖維)
Week 16-17 Functional Fiber (機能性纖維)
Week 18: Final exam
scorePolicy:
1.	小考 / Quiz: 20%
2.	期中考 / Midterm: 30%
3.	期末考 / Final exam: 40% 
4.	出席 / Attend: 10%
materials:
1、	Manmade Fibers: Their Origin and Development, Raymond B. Seymour and Roger S. Porter, Elsevier applied Science, 1993
2、	紡織材料學，第 2 版，作者： 于偉東，出版社：中國紡織出版社，2018
3、	紡織品入門手冊，第 4 版，作者： 紡織所編輯群，出版社：紡織產業綜合研究所，2014
